Blackbird Clan Lord Leona Blackbird:
Finally, Etis van Etina is brought to an end.
This would have been impossible without your help. Astair van Halter, the King of Rune, Amadeo Cadmus, the King of Aden, and Navari, the Queen of Ertheia, left in haste as they couldn't leave their kingdoms any longer. But before they left, they left a gift for me to give you.
